thread.title: Sanders dances on Ellen DeGeneres's show
thread.title_full: Sanders dances on Ellen DeGeneres's show

title: Sanders dances on Ellen DeGeneres's show
text:
Sanders dances on Ellen DeGeneres's show Candidate says he has been in handcuffs UPDATED 1:34 AM CDT Oct 15, 2015 Photos Adam Rose/CNN 
Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders said he would be stranded on a deserted island with Florida Sen. Marco Rubio because "He's used to the sun." Videos Clinton sent GOP 2016ers copies of... 
And what his Ben and Jerry's ice cream flavor would be? "Bern, Bernie, Bern." 
Those were some of the answers Sanders gave to Ellen DeGeneres during his appearance on her show, taped Wednesday. Sanders also showed off some of his moves, obliging his host's frequent request for her guests to dance. 
Sanders was also asked by DeGeneres whether he had ever been in handcuffs. 
"I don't know exactly what you mean by that. I was," he said, chuckling alongside DeGeneres. "I take it to mean, was I ever arrested by the police. When I was young, I was involved in a civil rights demonstration."
